events.name: TST Sober Faction: Sobriety Without Superstition
events.description: Co-director Jon will host a speaker meeting on April 30.

events.name: The Satanic Chef
events.description: Join Adam Dodge in the kitchen of VHQ for a cooking workshop and conversation. Keep your eyes out for Sous Chef Jack!

events.name: Ave Satanas: A Candlelight Ritual
events.description: An international candlelight ritual with guest participation written by Thomas O'Brien Vallor and Marissa Young. In memoriam to those who lost their lives and suffered under religious persecution and superstition by candlelight. Houseguests are encouraged to wear mourning attire and bring a candle to participate in the ritual.

events.name: Forgive Me Father, For I Have Synthed
events.description: A synthwave/retrowave night of sin to honour our fallen sisters, persecuted by pseudoscience. All original music by Lazermortis.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
